thread.title: Tony Weber
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Tony Weber

author: Tony Weber
title: Tony Weber
text:
I went in as a first time customer looking for portable digital recorders, as my old one had just failed and I was just about to fly out for a recording session. The staff member who assisted me went through the models available and was very helpful in outlining the features of them. The prices were very comparable to those on the internet and the choice I made, the Roland R-05, has performed brilliantly.
Great work guys, and thanks for all your help.
